name.baseName: Printing plate production ; Printing plate (intaglio) ; Organic solvents ; Gravure plate making (metal processing), gravure plate making (electro-engraving or laser engraving), gravure plate making (carbon paper etching plate making), gravure plate making (photographic plate making) ; All sizes; NESPS2
印版生产 ; 印版（凹版） ; 有机溶剂 ; 凹版制版（金属加工）、凹版制版（电雕或激光雕刻）、凹版制版（碳素纸腐蚀制版）、凹版制版（照相制版） ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative thermal combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative thermal combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 使用有机溶剂的凹版制版过程应用于生产凹版印刷版，这在高质量打印应用中是必不可少的，例如货币、邮票、包装和其他专业印刷材料。该过程涉及多种技术，包括金属加工、电雕或梁雕刻、碳素纸腐蚀和照相方法。此数据集适用于生产各种尺寸凹版印刷版的行业。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码23,三级代码232.0,四级代码2320文件，在完整版文件中第523页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为有机溶剂，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative thermal combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是蓄热式热力燃烧法，其效率为94，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/总生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
